working.title: Header Matches
working.description: The header text and buttons are correct as per the design.

working.title: Main Title Display
working.description: The main title 'Your dream jobs in one platform' matches the design.

working.title: Button Positioning
working.description: Login and sign-up buttons are properly positioned.

wrong.title: Search Bar Text Mismatch
wrong.description: The text in the search bar differs from the design: 'Search jobs' instead of 'Search for a job'.

wrong.title: Dropdown Indicator Missing
wrong.description: The dropdown indicator for 'About us' is missing on the website.

wrong.title: Search Bar Text Mismatch
wrong.description: The text in the search bar differs from the design: 'Search jobs' instead of 'Search for a job'.

wrong.title: Dropdown Indicator Missing
wrong.description: The dropdown indicator for 'About us' is missing on the website.

wrong.title: Button Styles
wrong.description: The 'Sign up' button is styled differently in the implemented page compared to the Figma design.

wrong.title: Visual Fidelity - Incorrect Elements
wrong.description: The padding and spacing are slightly different, and the font color appears off.

wrong.title: Font Weight
wrong.description: Font weights for headings and labels are slightly off.

recommendations.title: Search Bar Text
recommendations.description: Adjust the search bar text to match the design 'Search for a job'.

recommendations.title: Dropdown Indicator
recommendations.description: Add the dropdown indicator for 'About us' as per the design.

recommendations.title: Typography Consistency
recommendations.description: Ensure the font size and weight are consistent across different job titles as per the Figma design.

recommendations.title: Whitespace Optimization
recommendations.description: Consider optimizing the whitespace between job cards for better visual alignment with the Figma design.

recommendations.title: Visual Fidelity - Recommended Improvements
recommendations.description: Consider adjusting padding and spacing to match the design more closely. Review font styling for consistency.

recommendations.title: Font Consistency
recommendations.description: Ensure font weights match the Figma design for consistency.

recommendations.title: Button Contrast
recommendations.description: Enhance button contrast for better visibility.
